title: Client Crashing!!!!! Help
body: Just tonight I was in my series for gold and in champ select the client crashed and it ended my series.... then in tilted fury I played and lost a couple games but queing up for another and another crash then another and its been three now I don't know what I need to do because its something out of my control costing me a rank or series{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Crashes during champ select are typically caused by your client losing its connection to the game platform service enough that it simply cannot stay connected at all. Most of the time, this is the result of incompatible network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if those changes resolved your issue or not.
